attributes.action: We the People ask the government to declare Pakistan State Sponsor of Terrorism.
attributes.background:
Pakistan has been using state sponsored terrorism as a policy to progress its interests in India, Afghanistan and many other countries.
Pakistan has been sending armed terrorists into the India with the help of Pakistan Army this clearly proves that the state of Pakistan is a sponsor of terrorism.

rejection.details:
“State Sponsors of Terrorism” is a designation used by the Department of State in the United States of America. This designation is not used in this way by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
